EmailTemplate.name: Entities Created on Megan Mumbai
EmailTemplate.subject: New Entity "{!Account.Name}" Created in Megan Mumbai
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello Ram,
There is a new Entity created in Megan Mumbai.
{!Account.OwnerFirstName} is the owner of the Entity "{!Account.Name}".
Please followup with {!Account.OwnerFirstName} to get the details so that you can incorporate them onto the Advisor Factory.
Herein is the link of the same:{!Account.Link}
Thank You,
Ffreedom Team.
